alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Lower Yukon Valley; Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula; Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys; Upper Kuskokwim Valley; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 1:44AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Stormy Pattern Upcoming Late This Week into Early Next Week... A moist Pineapple Express pattern will develop late Friday and persist through early next week, which will come in several waves of moisture from the Pacific. Currently, heavy snow looks to be the main weather impact, although some locations may see brief periods of rain and freezing rain, especially across the Lower Yukon Valley and the Middle Kuskokwim Valley. Residents and interested parties should stay tuned in and monitor the latest forecasts at weather.gov/fairbanks and at our Twitter and Facebook social media accounts for further updates.
